The claim stated that President Trump: s limousine driver did burnouts to entertain Daytona 500 spectators during a rain delay.
The expert: s investigation found an altered image circulating on Facebook and Twitter, showing the presidential limo doing burnouts.
Multiple media organizations reported th: s limo took a warmup lap around the track, confirming the presence of the limousine at the event.
